summary: Adds a map marker at Dayspring Canyon and fixes the Quest Marker to first point towards Dayspring Canyon in the Dawnguard quest if your not in Dayspring Canyon.
descriptionHtml:
It is such a pain to get to Fort Dawnguard since you need to find the entrance to [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Dayspring_Canyon]Dayspring Canyon[/url] first. Which the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Dawnguard_(quest)]Dawnguard[/url] quest doesn't let you know about. This mod will add a map marker at the entrance of Dayspring Canyon and make it the first map marker that appears when you start the Dawnguard quest. Also it will inform you in the Dawnguard quest Objectives that you need to travel through Dayspring Canyon to get to Fort Dawnguard and fixes the Quest Marker to first point towards Dayspring Canyon in the Dawnguard quest if your not in Dayspring Canyon. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/760/?]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
Dawnguard

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
